events.message: I recently received my order, but I would like to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied with the quality.
The customer's refund request has been identified and the case will be categorized under Refund for further handling.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request and will respond to the customer shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund?
To start the refund process, please send us the order number and specify any issues you encountered with the product.
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived late and the color is different from what was shown. I would prefer a full refund rather than an exchange.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 5-7 business days for the amount to reflect.
Thank you for your prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick refund process and will consider shopping again in the future.
The refund request has been fully processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received successfully and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
